Pre-Game Insights: The Heat are 11-10 in Eastern Conference games and rank fifth with 33.6 defensive rebounds per game led by Bam Adebayo averaging 7.5.
The Pacers are 9-14 in conference matchups and lead in scoring 50.6 points per game in the paint with Pascal Siakam averaging 9.0.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Heat score 111.3 points per game, 5.6 fewer than the Pacers' 116.9.
The Pacers average 12.7 made 3-pointers per game, 0.6 fewer than the Heat allow.
Others: Key players include Tyler Herro for the Heat and Myles Turner for the Pacers.
Injuries: Heat have Dru Smith out and Josh Richardson day-to-day; Pacers have Aaron Nesmith, Isaiah Jackson, and James Wiseman out.
